auth.signin_subtitle: Sign in to access your shares
auth.signup_subtitle: Join SnowShare to start sharing securely
auth.already_account: Already have an account? Sign in

profile.title: My Profile

accounts.title: Connected OAuth Accounts
accounts.description: Manage OAuth accounts linked to your profile. You can sign in with any of these accounts.
accounts.confirm_unlink_message: Are you sure you want to unlink this {{provider}} account?

setup.title: Initial Setup
setup.description: Welcome! No users exist yet. Create the first administrator account to start using SnowShare.
setup.info: This account will be the first administrator of SnowShare.
setup.success_message: First account created successfully! You can now sign in.
setup.admin_notice: This account will have all administrator privileges.

admin.title: Administration Dashboard
admin.subtitle: Manage your SnowShare instance
admin.error_access_denied: Access Denied. You do not have permission to view this page.

oauth.title: OAuth Providers
oauth.description: Configure external authentication providers. You will need to create an OAuth app on the provider's developer console.
oauth.callback_help: Copy this URL to your OAuth provider settings.
oauth.secret_help: The secret is encrypted before being stored.

links.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this link?
links.no_links: No custom links added. GitHub and License links will be displayed.

branding.app_name_hint: The name displayed in the navigation bar and page title
branding.app_description_hint: The description displayed on the home page
branding.logo_url_hint: URL of an image for the logo (PNG, SVG recommended)
branding.favicon_url_hint: URL of an image for the favicon (ICO, PNG)
branding.primary_color_hint: Used for buttons, links and main accents
branding.accent_color_hint: Used for gradients and secondary elements
branding.info_1: Branding changes are applied immediately to all users
branding.info_2: Use absolute URLs for logo and favicon (https://...)
branding.info_3: Colors must be in hexadecimal format (#RRGGBB)
